title: "Invalid timbre logging level" after upgrade from 1.4 to 1.4.1 or relogin on 1.4.1
body:
# Bug Report

## Problem

After upgrade and login got an error 
![IMAGE 2020-06-25 11:58:53](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4557972/85698759-3e726980-b6db-11ea-972d-db1e70bf1110.jpg)


#### Expected behavior
can upgrade normally 

#### Actual behavior
error after upgrade

### Reproduction

[comment]: # (Describe how we can replicate the bug step by step.)

- Install 1.4 from store
- Upgrade to build from https://ci.status.im/job/status-react/job/release/job/release%252F1.5.x/
- Login

### Additional Information

- Status version:  1.4.1 (builds https://ci.status.im/job/status-react/job/release/job/release%252F1.5.x/)
- Operating System: Android,iOS

#### Logs

```
06-25 11:38:53.952 16546 16636 D ReactNativeJS: DEBUG [status-im.utils.handlers:44] - Handling re-frame event:  :mailserver/check-connection-timeout
06-25 11:39:01.598 16546 16546 D ReactNative: ReactInstanceManager.detachViewFromInstance()

06-25 11:39:03.954 16546 16636 D ReactNativeJS: DEBUG [status-im.utils.handlers:44] - Handling re-frame event:  :mailserver/check-connection-timeout
06-25 11:39:13.953 16546 16636 D ReactNativeJS: DEBUG [status-im.utils.handlers:44] - Handling re-frame event:  :mailserver/check-connection-timeout
```

It is also reproducible after relogin into account in 1.4.1
Not reproducible on nightly 25/06/2020

IMO can be related to https://github.com/PascalPrecht/status-react/commit/a7b15565cafab7ff70798a3725294070e3554521 
(but not sure) and to the fact, that it is INFO by default in nightly builds and disabled in release builds
@churik very likely that it's related to my commit. I'll take a look at it tomorrow morning first thing!
